pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 6, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Penticton, British Columbia

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a BC Day picnic and deliver brief remarks.

Gyro Park
55 Main Street 

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should gather at Veterans Memorial Park (adjacent to Gyro Park) no later than 10:45 a.m.
